headline: How the Dow Got to 50000, in Charts
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average topped 50000 for the first time on Friday.  In a tech-dominated market, some surprising stocks powered the climb.  Here is a look at the stocks leading the latest leg higher—and the ones slowing things down.

raw.headline: How the Dow Got to 50000, in Charts

headline: How Caterpillar Became a Butterfly
summary: Caterpillar broke out of its chrysalis during 2025, transforming into a high-flying butterfly.

headline: Howard Lutnick 'Should Just Resign' Over Epstein Ties, Thomas Massie Says: Here's Which Companies Would Benefit From That
summary: Howard Lutnick may leave Trump admin in 2026, as markets predict. His resignation would affect companies like TSM, Samsung, and Caterpillar.

raw.headline: Howard Lutnick 'Should Just Resign' Over Epstein Ties, Thomas Massie Says: Here's Which Companies Would Benefit From That

headline: Heard on the Street Friday Recap: Blue-Chip Rally
summary: Nvidia and Caterpillar were the Dow's top gainers, rising nearly 8% and 7.1% respectively.  The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq composite each gained roughly 2%, following three days of declines.  Amazon joined the AI spending party.
